      • createLedgerMetadata

        public void createLedgerMetadata(long lid,
                                 LedgerMetadata metadata,
                                 org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.GenericCallback<Void> ledgerCb)
        Description copied from interface: LedgerManager
        Create a new ledger with provided ledger id and metadata
        Specified by:
        createLedgerMetadata in interface LedgerManager
        Parameters:
        lid - Ledger id provided to be created
        metadata - Metadata provided when creating the new ledger
        ledgerCb - Callback when creating a new ledger. Return code:
        • BKException.Code.OK if success
        • BKException.Code.LedgerExistException if given ledger id exist
        • BKException.Code.ZKException/BKException.Code.MetaStoreException for other issue

                               org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.GenericCallback<LedgerMetadata> readCb)
        Description copied from interface: LedgerManager
        Read ledger metadata of a specified ledger.
        Specified by:
        readLedgerMetadata in interface LedgerManager
        Parameters:
        ledgerId - Ledger Id
        readCb - Callback when read ledger metadata. Return code:
        • BKException.Code.OK if success
        • BKException.Code.NoSuchLedgerExistsException if ledger not exist
        • BKException.Code.ZKException for other issue

      • writeLedgerMetadata

        public void writeLedgerMetadata(long ledgerId,
                                LedgerMetadata metadata,
                                org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.GenericCallback<Void> cb)
        Description copied from interface: LedgerManager
        Write ledger metadata.
        Specified by:
        writeLedgerMetadata in interface LedgerManager
        Parameters:
        ledgerId - Ledger Id
        metadata - Ledger Metadata to write
        cb - Callback when finished writing ledger metadata. Return code:
        • BKException.Code.OK if success
        • BKException.Code.MetadataVersionException if version in metadata doesn't match
        • BKException.Code.ZKException for other issue

      • asyncProcessLedgers

        public void asyncProcessLedgers(org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.Processor<Long> processor,
                                org.apache.zookeeper.AsyncCallback.VoidCallback finalCb,
                                Object context,
                                int successRc,
                                int failureRc)
        Description copied from interface: LedgerManager
        Loop to process all ledgers.

          After all ledgers were processed, finalCb will be triggerred:
        • if all ledgers are processed done with OK, success rc will be passed to finalCb.
        • if some ledgers are prcoessed failed, failure rc will be passed to finalCb.

        Specified by:
        asyncProcessLedgers in interface LedgerManager
        Parameters:
        processor - Ledger Processor to process a specific ledger
        finalCb - Callback triggered after all ledgers are processed
        context - Context of final callback
        successRc - Success RC code passed to finalCb when callback
        failureRc - Failure RC code passed to finalCb when exceptions occured.

      • asyncProcessLedgers
